episodes.title: Is Pam Bondi Hiding the Truth About Trump in the Epstein Files?
episodes.description:
"I put in 'Trump,' 'Donald,' or 'Don' and it came back with more than a million citations." ⁠
⁠
Rep. Jamie Raskin has searched through the unredacted Epstein files and he found a lot of Donald Trump. Raskin shared more about his findings and insights with the hosts of Slate's Political Gabfest—Emily Bazelon, John Dickerson, and David Plotz—at a live event in  Washington DC this week. ⁠
⁠
Raskin also unpacked the contentious House Judiciary Committee hearing with AG Pam Bondi and explained why he thinks Bondi is orchestrating a massive cover-up. ⁠

You can watch the full conversation now: https://youtu.be/u-KBYR2P7Os?si=DScxOw6qeBKAahAv

episodes.title: Jamie Raskin Explains How He Triggered Pam Bondi's Epstein Meltdown
episodes.description: This week, Emily Bazelon, John Dickerson, and David Plotz are joined live in Washington, D.C. by Jamie Raskin, the U.S. representative for Maryland’s 8th Congressional District in the U.S. House of Representatives, to discuss Jeffrey Epstein, his hearing with Pam Bondi, and what comes after Trump.
